cells.data:
• install maven: http://www.mkyong.com/maven/install-maven-on-mac-osx/ (clearest instructions I could find)
  • save both the SDK zip and sh script to the BCL-Content/docs/en/video-cloud/maven directory
  • open terminal in /maven
  • bash ./build-repo-for-release.sh repo android-native-player-<version>

Note the last argument will be the actual zip filename -- <version> will vary with the build
